Yasmine Lafitte (Arabic) bụ onye France bụbu onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ nke na-eme n'okpuru aha Yasmine

A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ ndị Alakụba na-edebe ihe n'ụzọ ziri ezi na Thar Es-Souk, obere obodo dị na Morocco, Lafitte na ezinụlọ ya kwagara France mgbe ọ dị naanị ọnwa ise, ọ tolitere na mpaghara Lyon. Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ hapụrụ ezinụlọ ya; n'oge a, ọ zụrụ ịghọ onye nọọsụ ma rụọ ọrụ dịka onye na-ere nri iji kwụọ ụgwọ maka ọmụmụ ya.

N'afọ 2004, ya na enyi ya nwoke banyere n'ụlọ ọrụ ndị okenye n'oge ahụ, mgbe ọ zaghachiri mgbasa ozi magazin nke obere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta nke na-achọ di na nwunye na-etochabeghị. N'afọ 2006, e gosipụtara ya n'otu ihe omume nke TF1 talk show La Méthode Cauet, mgbe ahụ a rịọrọ ya na ajụjụ ọnụ akwụkwọ akụkọ, mkpuchi magazin na ihe omume jet-set, ọ ghọkwara onye na-ekwuchitere magazin FHM. N'afọ 2007, ya na onye na-emepụta Marc Dorcel bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta pụrụ iche. N'otu afọ ahụ, o nwere ọrụ dị mkpa na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri Danielle Arbid bụ A Lost Man, nke gosipụtara na 60th Cannes Film Festival. N'afọ 2008, o nwere ọrụ nkwado na ihe nkiri mpụ Olivier Marchal bụ MR 73. Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ n'ọtụtụ mmepụta mba ụwa, ọ lara ezumike nká site na ịrụ ọrụ ndị okenye n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2009 iji lekwasị anya n'ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ọdịnala na mmepụta.
N'afọ 2005, ya na Olivier Lafitte malitere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta nke ya n'okpuru aha "Alko Productions".
